verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei These [are] now the chief אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Hem of their fathers וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֑ם <S%H3187><s%> ve-hit-yach-Sam; and [this is] the genealogy הָעֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lim of them that went up עִמִּ֗י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi, in בְּמַלְכ֛וּת <S%H4438><s%> be-mal-Chut in the reign אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> 'ar-tach-Shast of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> mib-ba-Vel. with me from Babylon ס sa-Mek

מִבְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Of the sons פִֽינְחָס֙ <S%H6372><s%> fi-ne-Chas of Phinehas גֵּֽרְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H1647><s%> ge-re-Shom, Gershom ס sa-Mek מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <S%H385><s%> 'i-ta-Mar of Ithamar דָּנִיֵּ֑אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel; Daniel ס sa-Mek מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons דָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David חַטּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H2407><s%> chat-Tush. Hattush ס sa-Mek

מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Of the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֔ה <S%H7935><s%> she-chan-Yah, of Shechaniah ס sa-Mek מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons פַרְעֹ֖שׁ <S%H6551><s%> far-'Osh of Pharosh זְכַרְיָ֑ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah; Zechariah וְעִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo accompanying הִתְיַחֵ֥שׂ <S%H3187><s%> hit-ya-Ches and with him were reckoned by genealogy לִזְכָרִ֖ים <S%H2145><s%> liz-cha-Rim of the males מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim. and fifty ס sa-Mek

מִבְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Of the sons פַּחַ֣ת pa-Chat מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H6355><s%> mo-'Av, of Pahathmoab אֶלְיְהֽוֹעֵינַ֖י <S%H454><s%> el-ye-ho-'ei-Nai Elihoenai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זְרַֽחְיָ֑ה <S%H2228><s%> ze-rach-Yah; of Zerahiah וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim and with him two hundred הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Of the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֖ה <S%H7935><s%> she-chan-Yah of Shechaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יַחֲזִיאֵ֑ל <S%H3166><s%> ya-cha-zi-'El; of Jahaziel וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh and with him three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei Of the sons עָדִ֔ין <S%H5720><s%> 'a-Din, also of Adin עֶ֖בֶד <S%H5651><s%> 'E-ved Ebed בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹנָתָ֑ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan; of Jonathan וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim and with him fifty הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei And of the sons עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam, of Elam יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖ה <S%H3470><s%> ye-sha'-Yah Jeshaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עֲתַלְיָ֑ה <S%H6271><s%> 'a-tal-Yah; of Athaliah וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im and with him seventy הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei And of the sons שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah, of Shephatiah זְבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H2069><s%> ze-vad-Yah Zebadiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מִֽיכָאֵ֑ל <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El; of Michael וְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> she-mo-Nim and with him fourscore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Of the sons יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av, of Joab עֹבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H5662><s%> 'oad-Yah Obadiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְחִיאֵ֑ל <S%H3171><s%> ye-chi-'El; of Jehiel וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo two מָאתַ֛יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim and with him two hundred וּשְׁמֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah eight עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei And of the sons שְׁלוֹמִ֖ית <S%H8019><s%> she-lo-Mit of Shelomith בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹסִפְיָ֑ה <S%H3131><s%> yo-sif-Yah; of Josiphiah וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah and with him an hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <S%H8346><s%> ve-shish-Shim and threescore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei And of the sons בֵבַ֔י <S%H893><s%> ve-Vai, of Bebai זְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בֵּבָ֑י <S%H893><s%> be-Vai; of Bebai וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and with him twenty וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah and eight הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei And of the sons עַזְגָּ֔ד <S%H5803><s%> 'az-Gad, of Azgad יוֹחָנָ֖ן <S%H3110><s%> yo-cha-Nan Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַקָּטָ֑ן <S%H6997><s%> hak-ka-Tan; of Hakkatan וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah and with him an hundred וַעֲשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H6235><s%> va-'a-sa-Rah and ten הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei sons אֲדֹנִיקָם֮ <S%H140><s%> 'a-do-ni-Kam of Adonikam אַחֲרֹנִים֒ <S%H314><s%> 'a-cha-ro-Nim And of the last וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh those שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> she-mo-Tam, whose names אֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <S%H467><s%> 'e-li-Fe-let [are] these Eliphelet יְעִיאֵ֣ל <S%H3273><s%> ye-'i-'El Jeiel וּֽשְׁמַעְיָ֑ה <S%H8098><s%> u-she-ma'-Yah; and Shemaiah וְעִמָּהֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-ma-Hem with שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim and with them threescore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males ס sa-Mek

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei Of the sons בִגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> vig-Vai also of Bigvai עוּתַ֣י <S%H5793><s%> 'u-Tai Uthai; וְזָבוּד ve-za-vud כוְזַכּ֑וּר <S%H2072><s%> ve-zak-Kur; Zabbud קוְעִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im and with them seventy הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim. males פ Peh

וָֽאֶקְבְּצֵ֗ם <S%H6908><s%> va-'ek-be-Tzem, And I gathered them together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at הַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har to the river הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> hab-Ba that runneth אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲוָ֔א <S%H163><s%> 'a-ha-Va, to Ahava וַנַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H2583><s%> van-na-cha-Neh and there abode we in tents שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham where יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days שְׁלֹשָׁ֑ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah; three וָאָבִ֤ינָה <S%H995><s%> va-'a-Vi-nah and I viewed בָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> va-'Am the people וּבַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> u-vak-Ko-ha-Nim, and the priests וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei there none of the sons לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti and found שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֡ה <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-le-Chah Then sent לֶאֱלִיעֶ֡זֶר <S%H461><s%> le-'e-li-'E-zer I for Eliezer לַאֲרִיאֵ֡ל <S%H740><s%> la-'a-ri-'El for Ariel לִֽ֠שְׁמַעְיָה <S%H8098><s%> Lish-ma'-yah for Shemaiah וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֨ן <S%H494><s%> u-le-'el-na-Tan and for Elnathan וּלְיָרִ֜יב <S%H3402><s%> u-le-ya-Riv and for Jarib וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֧ן <S%H494><s%> u-le-'el-na-Tan and for Elnathan וּלְנָתָ֛ן <S%H5416><s%> u-le-na-Tan and for Nathan וְלִזְכַרְיָ֥ה <S%H2148><s%> ve-liz-char-Yah and for Zechariah וְלִמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> ve-lim-shul-Lam and for Meshullam רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim; chief men וּלְיוֹיָרִ֥יב <S%H3114><s%> u-le-yo-ya-Riv also for Joiarib וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֖ן <S%H494><s%> u-le-'el-na-Tan and for Elnathan מְבִינִֽים׃ <S%H995><s%> me-vi-Nim men of understanding

וָאֹוצִאָה va-'o-tzi-'ah כוָאֲצַוֶּ֤ה <S%H3318><s%> va-'a-tzav-Veh after קאוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אִדּ֣וֹ <S%H112><s%> id-Do unto Iddo הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh, the chief בְּכָסִפְיָ֖א <S%H3703><s%> be-cha-sif-Ya Casiphia הַמָּק֑וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom; at the place וָאָשִׂימָה֩ <S%H7760><s%> va-'a-si-Mah appoint בְּפִיהֶ֨ם <S%H6310><s%> be-fi-Hem according דְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim them what לְ֠דַבֵּר <S%H1696><s%> Le-dab-ber they should say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִדּ֨וֹ <S%H112><s%> id-Do unto Iddo אָחִ֤יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv [and] to his brethren; הַנְּתוּנִים han-ne-tu-nim כהַנְּתִינִים֙ <S%H5411><s%> han-ne-ti-Nim Nethinims קבְּכָסִפְיָ֣א <S%H3703><s%> be-cha-sif-Ya Casiphia הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, at the place לְהָֽבִיא־ <S%H935><s%> le-ha-vi- that they should bring לָ֥נוּ La-nu מְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tim unto us ministers לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit for the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God

וַיָּבִ֨יאּוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi'-'u upon us they brought לָ֜נוּ La-nu כְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> ke-yad- hand אֱלֹהֵ֨ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God הַטּוֹבָ֤ה <S%H2896><s%> hat-to-Vah And by the good עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish us a man שֶׂ֔כֶל <S%H7922><s%> Se-chel, of understanding מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons מַחְלִ֔י <S%H4249><s%> mach-Li, of Mahli בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְשֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֛ה <S%H8274><s%> ve-she-re-ve-Yah and Sherebiah וּבָנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav with his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. teen

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Yah, And Hashabiah וְאִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> ve-'it-To for יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖ה <S%H3470><s%> ye-sha'-Yah and with him Jeshaiah מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons מְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri; of Merari אֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav his brethren וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei-Hem and their sons עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim. twenty ס sa-Mek

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הַנְּתִינִ֗ים <S%H5411><s%> han-ne-ti-Nim, Also of the Nethinims שֶׁנָּתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> shen-na-Tan had appointed דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid whom David וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> ve-has-sa-Rim and the princes לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, of the Levites נְתִינִ֖ים <S%H5411><s%> ne-ti-Nim Nethinims מָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim two hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֑ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim; and twenty כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam all נִקְּב֥וּ <S%H5344><s%> nik-ke-Vu all of them were expressed בְשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8034><s%> ve-she-Mot. by name

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> va-'ek-Ra Then I proclaimed שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there צוֹם֙ <S%H6685><s%> tzOm a fast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at הַנָּהָ֣ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har there at the river אַהֲוָ֔א <S%H163><s%> 'a-ha-Va, of Ahava לְהִתְעַנּ֖וֹת <S%H6031><s%> le-hit-'an-Not that we might afflict לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei ourselves before אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to seek מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech way יְשָׁרָ֔ה <S%H3477><s%> ye-sha-Rah, of him a right לָ֥נוּ La-nu וּלְטַפֵּ֖נוּ <S%H2945><s%> u-le-tap-Pe-nu for us and for our little ones וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- and all רְכוּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-She-nu. and for all our substance
